Job.JobDescription: Bennett School District 29J is currently accepting applications for qualified candidates for coaching positions for the 2025-2026 school year. In your resume and/or cover letter please include the following information: 1) Background and athletic skills 2) Background in sports participation ((Sport/School or location/Dates) 3) Coaching Experience (Sport/School or location/Dates) 4) Any additional experience in working with youth. Requirements: Satisfactory completion of criminal background check High school diploma OR equivalent AND sufficient experience to demonstrate the knowledge, skills and abilities for the position.
Job.Location: Bennett School District, 805 Washington Way, Bennett, CO 80102
Job.Experience: Coaching Experience (Sport/School or location/Dates), experience in working with youth, High school diploma OR equivalent AND sufficient experience
Job.Benefits: Four Day School Week. This position is not applicable for any Benefits
